page.title: 15RELIGION
page.content: The church of St. Mary's,Ruabon and the church of St. John the Evangelist, Rhosymedre,(both Church in Wales),average 60 communicants each Sunday and 120 for festivals.They average about 25 confirmations,30 baptisms,15 weddings and 25 funerals a year.Sunday school membership is 20.Groups such as Brownies,Guides,Cubs scouts,mothers union,bellringers, ladies guild,mens society are linked to the church.1982 Catholics began to share with Anglicans the use of St. Mary's church,Ruabon.The catholics at Ruabon and at Eglwys Mair Wen,Acrefair average 190 members,with 24 marriages,24 funerals,12 confirmations and 8 baptisms a year.There are also non-conformists eg. Welsh Presbyterian,English and Welsh Methodists,baptists and congregationalists.
